PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-16032010-12-09,  ,  ,  ND, 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectEx-Gratia Payment - True Patriot Love Foundation and the Royal Canadian Naval Benevolent Fund
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of National Defence to issue a one-time EX-GRATIA PAYMENT of $100,000.00 each to the TRUE PATRIOT LOVE FOUNDATION and the ROYAL CANADIAN NAVAL BENVOLENT FUND on behalf of Her Majesty the Queen and His Royal Highness the Duke of Edinburgh.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Ex-Gratia Payment - True Patriot Love Foundation and the Royal Canadian Naval Benevolent Fund
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of National Defence to issue a one-time EX-GRATIA PAYMENT of $100,000.00 each to the TRUE PATRIOT LOVE FOUNDATION and the ROYAL CANADIAN NAVAL BENVOLENT FUND on behalf of Her Majesty the Queen and His Royal Highness the Duke of Edinburgh.
